title: Warning: 'static' function 'noop_deleter' declared in header file should be declared 'static inline' [-Wunneeded-internal-declaration]
body_html:
I'm seeing the following warning with Clang when I build PyTorch 0f4ae13:

In file included from torch/csrc/autograd/generated/VariableType.cpp:1:
In file included from torch/csrc/autograd/generated/VariableType.h:5:
In file included from /data/users/ezyang/onnx-pytorch/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/ATen/ATen.h:5:
/data/users/ezyang/onnx-pytorch/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/ATen/Type.h:40:13: warning: 'static' function 'noop_deleter' declared in header file should be declared 'static inline' [-Wunneeded-internal-declaration]
static void noop_deleter(void*) {}
body_text:
I'm seeing the following warning with Clang when I build PyTorch 0f4ae13:
In file included from torch/csrc/autograd/generated/VariableType.cpp:1:
In file included from torch/csrc/autograd/generated/VariableType.h:5:

/data/users/ezyang/onnx-pytorch/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/ATen/Type.h:40:13: warning: 'static' function 'noop_deleter' declared in header file should be declared 'static inline' [-Wunneeded-internal-declaration]
static void noop_deleter(void*) {}
body:
I'm seeing the following warning with Clang when I build PyTorch 0f4ae13f0541981c58541cb20f38b780e6fcd38d:

```
In file included from torch/csrc/autograd/generated/VariableType.cpp:1:
In file included from torch/csrc/autograd/generated/VariableType.h:5:
In file included from /data/users/ezyang/onnx-pytorch/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/ATen/ATen.h:5:
/data/users/ezyang/onnx-pytorch/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/ATen/Type.h:40:13: warning: 'static' function 'noop_deleter' declared in header file should be declared 'static inline' [-Wunneeded-internal-declaration]
static void noop_deleter(void*) {}
```
